messages.text:
Hello!

VIGIL AI is online and monitoring your home. I'm ready to assist you with any security-related questions.

For a quick overview, here's the latest activity:

  • 08:00 PM: Front door locked manually.
  • 08:15 PM: Camera 3 recorded an unknown vehicle nearby.
  • 08:30 PM: No recent activity detected; system in standby.

For more details on specific events, please ask.
